articles.content: Fertiliser stocks have been in focus over the last few days with the Street anticipating some relief in Goods and Services Tax (GST) on the sector at the upcoming GST Council meeting on June 22.Sourc… [+6289 chars]

articles.description: Nifty Bank index posted its best weekly gain in CY24, led by heavyweights. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, and IndusInd Bank all concluded the week with gains ranging between 1.50% and 4.8%.

articles.author: Rimjhim Singh
articles.title: Budget 2024: Capital markets eyeing hike in STT on high-frequency traders - Business Standard
articles.description: Union Budget 2024: The Securities Transaction Tax (STT) applies to every sale and purchase of equities listed on exchanges. The STT rate for selling options is 0.017%, while for futures, it is 0.01%
